text: 2023 marked my 16th full year of trading so I want to walk you through six things I've learned over my 16year trading career thus far at least provided that I don't blow up soon which hopefully not at this point but what I want to share with you are a handful of Lessons Learned now some of these will be things that I learned early on some of these things will be what I learned a little bit later but I want to specifically focus on some more off-the-wall ideas meaning I'm not going to talk to you about the very basics of what it takes to be successful in trading like managing risk those are Givens so I want to share with you some more of the nuanced Concepts that I've learned over my career trading what's up everybody Eric here welcome back to the outlier shout out to the patreon family consider signing up let's get straight into what we got going on so what's the first thing the markets remind me of Nature and what I mean by that is nature doesn't really root for people it doesn't really root against people nature is indifferent if you watch any nature documentary I watch them a lot because I'm fascinated by it the animal kingdom is brutal we think it's brutal however it's really not it's not mean it's harsh but it's indifferent that directly applies to the markets the markets are indifferent to you to me
